wp:term.wp:term_description: Beautiful and elegant, our designs represent individual strength and perpetual power, worn outwardly to express what lies within.
Or rings are crafted from interlocking bands that gently shift shape as they glide with the body, always falling back together as a whole. This bold five-band ring is fluid and elegant.
Gift your loved ones with the chance to choose a jewel that fits their unique style.

Our necklaces feature mother-of-pearl, a natural, iridescent material found in oyster shells. The luminous pendants are traced with scintillating diamonds, resulting in a modern design with high shine and elegant luster.

item.title: Post Content Template
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
The journey to creative inspiration can be an infinitely fulfilling one. When we are in alignment and our creativity is flowing, it seems as if all the world is opening up to us and revealing its beauty. When creative blockages emerge, however—due to stress, self-doubt or simply becoming stagnant in our own routines—inspiration can seem increasingly elusive. This month, we’re diving deep into the creative journey and sharing our steps to reawaken inspiration—just in time to greet spring, the season of renewal!

Below, the Satya Jewelry team shares some of their favorite moments and lessons of the past year—and the hope and positivity that 2020 holds for each of them.

Front matter, or preliminaries, is the first section of a book, and is usually the smallest section in terms of the number of pages. Each page is counted, but no folio or page number is expressed, or printed, on either display pages or blank pages. Book design is the art of incorporating the content, style, format, design, and sequence of the various components of a book into a coherent whole. In the words of Jan Tschichold, “methods and rules upon which it is impossible to improve, have been developed over centuries. To produce perfect books, these rules have to be brought back to life and applied.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k2JKO5Pgjwg&t=1sMy last trip was June 2019. I would usually just go with cousins or alone with my brother, but this time it was my brother and I, and our parents. Returning to Singapore, one of the more resolutely fascinating cities I have ever been to. Our host, Lee on the photo will be our companion during all our trip.

Moving into a new year is always excited and a perfect opportunity to reflect on the year we are leaving behind and the new year we are being. For me, 2019 was a year of great change. Breaking down old and rebuilding new. This is sometimes very hard but I believe it has set the tone for the year ahead.

Satya Tweet
As this decade comes to a close, I can say this year has had its ups and downs but I am grateful to end the year in good health. I’ve always been a huge fan of fashion and design so I was most excited to learn that a collection I helped design for a friend had been picked up by a major retailer. Starting a new job 2 weeks after I moved into a new place was challenging but everyone was so supportive and helpful that it made the transition a lot easier. I am excited to see what 2020 brings!

Recent Posts

Starting at Satya Jewelry just 6 months ago, I can say that I feel like I found my happy place. Being surrounded by friendly, kind, smart and genuine people is a blessing and I couldn’t ask for a better team. Front matter, or preliminaries, is the first section of a book, and is usually the smallest section in terms of the number of pages. Each page is counted, but no folio or page number is expressed, or printed, on either display pages or blank pages.

Book design is the art of incorporating the content, style, format, design, and sequence of the various components of a book into a coherent whole.

Working in customer service can be challenging at times, however, after getting to know Satya’s customers and their deep attachment and true love for their jewelry and the meaning behind it is truly inspiring. This upcoming year I am excited to see all of our beautiful collections come to life, and how we can continue to grow and make our following even bigger!

Want to join us? Make a list using these 4 simple steps:

  • Consider your challenges
  • Celebrate your highlights
  • List your blessings
  • Renew your focus for the year ahead

As we enter 2020, I couldn’t have asked for a better year to close out the decade. Both personally and professionally, this year has been full of great challenges and rewards. I was so excited to have completed my first ever Marathon in early November and followed that with my all-time favorite collaboration launch: The Yoga Girl Collection.

Both of these projects took a lot of hard work and dedication but wouldn’t have been possible without the support, collaboration, and teamwork from all of the amazing people around me.

I am excited to begin a new year free of so much that has been weighing me down. I feel excited about all the possibilities embarking on a new decade.While we cherish the magic of the season and look forward to a clean slate in the new year, we also like to steal a few precious moments to quietly reflect on the year we’re leaving behind: What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

item.title: Our Story
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Our Story

about us

Modular fine jewelry

With Bijoux, we’ve built a clever, customizable jewelry line that morphs with you. A necklace becomes a pair of anklets; an earring turns into a ring. Crafted from the finest materials and precious stones, Bijoux’s contemporary fine jewelry can be modified to match your mood, no matter where you are.

Precious metals

Our values

The world is our home and we are called to leave it better than we found it. Everything we do, from creating sustainable products to building communities, is based on that principle. When you buy Bijoux jewelry, you’re supporting our artists and helping them make their lives, and the lives of their families, better.

Our philosophy

Built on the idea that life is yours for the making, Bijoux is a modular fine jewelry brand that, in its modularity, empowers you to live exactly as you are in a world of limitless possibilities.

Bijoux

Anything less is

simply unaccep

e e expolore collections

Our Origins.
And where
we want to go.

Our founder, Annette Lasala Spillane, is a Filipina entrepreneur who was determined to share the unique design perspective of the Philippines with the world.

the foundations

Beautiful jewelry accessible to everyone

Whether you’re looking for minimal earrings, danglers that make a statement, or necklaces that draw the eye, you’ll find something you love, at a fair price.

We make it our business to bring you heirloom-quality pieces at a non-scary price

item.title: Retail Store
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Visit our retail store

450 NW Couch Street, Portland, Oregon 97209

Our showroom is our place of power! And we are always glad to see you here. We are waiting for you, and not only to help you with choosing perfect new jewelry, but just for a cup of coffee, a glass of prosecco and warm conversations.

(503) 954-2593

hello@oroxleather.com

item.title: Our Materials
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Our
Materials

14k
Solid Gold

Solid gold is a precious metal that will not oxidize or discolor since it is the least reactive metal. The 14k alloy gives our pieces their beautiful, subtle hue. It is also an active lifestyle’s best friend; it scratches less and doesn’t bend or wear out as easily as 18k.

Sterling silver

925 Sterling Silver is an alloy made of 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% copper. We plate our silver jewelry in rhodium, which gives it extra shine and durability. Rhodium is one of the costliest precious metals due to its rarity.

Diamonds

925 Sterling Silver is an alloy made of 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% copper. We plate our silver jewelry in rhodium, which gives it extra shine and durability. Rhodium is one of the costliest precious metals due to its rarity.

Pearls

Diamonds are one of the hardest natural substances found on earth. Our high-quality diamonds are ethically sourced from our suppliers who follow conflict-free and socially responsible practices

Related
Products

item.title: Gift Cards

item.content:encoded:

Jewelry with engraving

Create a unique jewelry for yourself or for an important person. You only have to choose one of models available for engraving and come up with your own message

Add special
words on your jewelry

Choose a jewelry from the models available for
engraving and add important words

Golden gift voucher

item.title: Customer Reviews
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Customer Reviews

☆☆☆☆☆ 4.5/5

34 reviews

5

RATING

Your customer service is outstanding, your packaging is beautiful and the products are wonderful - great quality! Your catalog is fabulous.

Emily Alvarado

4

RATING

This was an amazing buy. It was just as described and the customer service was just as amazing as the buy. I will be returning.

randy lyons

5

RATING

Couldn't be happier with the customer service! Enjoy wearing it often. Have four pieces of the ruby and sapphire stones.

Jenny M.

4.5

RATING

In love with my new earrings! The only downside is that I only own one pair... for now ;) Can't wait to get my next piece of jewelry.

elane Miller

5

RATING

Your customer service is outstanding, your packaging is beautiful and the products are wonderful - great quality! Your catalog is fabulous.

sasha jones

item.title: Delivery
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Delivery

Shipped Within 24 Hours

With Bijoux, we’ve built a clever, customizable jewelry line that morphs with you. A necklace becomes a pair of anklets; an earring turns into a ring. Crafted from the finest materials and precious stones, Bijoux’s contemporary fine jewelry can be modified to match your mood, no matter where you are.

Free Shipping

Our online store now offers free 3-5 day shipping for US domestic addresses only, regardless of what you order. Orders will be shipped within 24 hours from the moment of ordering and could take up to 5 business days to be delivered.

Your
Confirmation

Once we have shipped your order you will receive a confirmation email. We ship with USPS and FedEx. When possible, we will send you a tracking number as provided by the shipping carrier.

Shipments depart Monday throughout Saturday by 12:00 PM Pacific Standard Time. Products ordered after noon are shipped next day.

Your Order
is on Its Way

We do not track packages nor do we have access to any additional information regarding a parcel’s location other than the shipper's tracking number which you are provided when a parcel ships. If you are shipping internationally or opt for expedited shipping, the rate charged is based on the weight of your products and your location.

Carriers
and Notifications

Once we have shipped your order you will receive a confirmation email.

  • We ship with USPS and FedEx.
  • When possible, we will send you a tracking number as provided by the shipping carrier, when your order ships.
  • Please allow at least 12 hours for the shipper's website to update before searching for your tracking report.

Fill the form below

item.title: Return & Cancellations
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Are the goods insured?

Absolutely, yes. Bijoux insures each purchase during the time it is in transit until it is delivered to you. Because we want to make sure you receive your products, we require that you sign for goods delivered. At that point, you become responsible for the pieces. However, if the pieces are to be delivered to someone other than yourself, then signature by the recipient at the specified delivery address constitutes for delivery by Bijoux and responsibility for the product is transferred at that point.

Why am I being charged taxes and duty?

We are a small business and while we pay for shipping, any additional customs duties, foreign taxes or other fees, which may be imposed, will be charged to the customer.

Return and refund policy?

We are confident that you will love and want to keep our products. Nevertheless, you have 14 days to try it out with everything in your closet. If it doesn’t work out, email us at team@bijoux.com and we will sort it out for you.

What is your exchange policy?

Unless the products are damaged or defective, we will not be able to exchange these items. If you would like to order a piece in a different size or a different product altogether, we will process it as a return. Please email us at team@bijoux.com so we can arrange it for you.

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
Bijoux FAQ

If you have other burning questions we weren't able to address here, feel free to email.

team@bijoux.com

Products

Are the pieces real?

100%! All our pieces are made of 14-karat gold and never plated. For our flagship collection we use gray diamonds, black diamonds, and opals. If you care for them as we recommend, you will enjoy them forever.

Where and how are they made?

All of our pieces are handmade by artisan goldsmiths in the Philippines. Coming very soon, we will take you into our studios so you can take a peek at the painstaking process involved in making LIMNIA pieces.

Where are the matereals from?

We purchase our gold from the Philippines, and, our stones and diamonds from Bangkok and India. While we can certify that our stones are conflict-free and ethically sourced, we are currently tracking the source of our gold.

How is bijoux different?

Our collection of modular fine jewelry essentials are designed to be creatively customized to keep up with your bold, dynamic life. Our pieces are made of high quality gold and stones, so you can wear them now while you build a jewelry wardrobe you will love forever.

Is there a way I can touch the products?

Our collection of modular fine jewelry essentials are designed to be creatively customized to keep up with your bold, dynamic life. Our pieces are made of high quality gold and stones, so you can wear them now while you build a jewelry wardrobe you will love forever.

Can I bring my old jewelry pieces to you for re-design?

We love collaborating on new designs especially when it involves a piece you love so much. Due to the size of our operation, we are unable to do any custom work right now. But if it means so much to you, shoot us an email at team@limnia.com and we will see what we can do.

Shipping

Our online store now offers free 3-5 day shipping for US domestic addresses only, regardless of what you order.

Will bijoux deliver to me?

If you live in any of the 50 states and Puerto Rico, LIMNIA will deliver to you. Our pieces might take longer to get to you if you live in Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico, but they will get there.

I live in Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico – when will I receive my order?

Shipping to these states will take a bit longer. Expect about 12-16 days from the time of your order.

What are my shipping options?

1) Ground: (5-8 days): Always free.


2) Expedited (2-3 days and available to the 48 contiguous states): $25


3) Overnight (1-2 days and available to the 48 contiguous states): $35

When will Bijoux ship my order?

As soon as we receive your order, we will process it for shipment. All orders placed after 12 pm PT are processed the following day. Our UPS or Fedex courier will then pick it up from us and be on his way to bring the pieces to you. You will receive an email with tracking number as soon as it’s on its way.

I can't track my order!

Don’t worry! Sometimes, it takes a couple of days to update your shipment status. Email us at team@limnia.com and we will let you know where your package is.

I accidentally put in the wrong address for my order.

Hate when that happens. But no worries! We will correct it for you if your purchase hasn’t shipped yet. Please email us at team@bijoux.com

Products

I want to learn more about the products.

Each piece already has a lot of information on its product page, however, if you need to know more, email us at: team@bijoux.com.

I’m allergic to nickel, will this be a problem with your jewelry?

You are not alone! We’ve tested our jewelry for nickel and lead and while it should be totally safe for you to wear, we cannot guarantee our products will not trigger an allergic reaction.

Returns & Exchanges

Can I return my jewelry?

Sorry it didn’t work out. You can return your unused pieces within 14 days of receiving them. Just send us an email at team@bijoux.com.

To be eligible for a return, please ensure that the jewelry is in its original packaging and in perfect condition, that you have the proof of purchase and that you’ve obtained the shipping label from us. We reserve the right to refuse returns that do not meet the criteria.

We will refund you in full back to your original form of payment. However, please note that we will not refund any shipping charges you paid.

If you have any other questions about returning your pieces or have any second thoughts, email us at team@bijoux.com.

When will i get my monay back for my return?

Refunds will take anywhere between 5-10 business days to appear back on your statement.

Help! I got the wrong product.

Oh no, we are so sorry about that. We will make it right for you. Please email us at: team@bijoux.com.

where should i drop off my return?

You can drop it off at any USPS collection box, USPS post office or any FedEx store.

Billing

What forms of payment do you accept?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, and American Express credit cards.

when will my credit card be charged?

Your credit card will be charged as soon as your order is accepted and processed.

what can i do if my payment is declined?

Not to worry, it happens to the best of us. Check the following:

Check that your card is not expired.
Double check the accuracy of your credit card’s billing details; such as the billing address and the security code (i.e. what you’ve entered into the checkout details).
Call your credit card issuer – they might’ve have stopped this payment from going through.

Order questions

I want to make changes to my order, how do I do that?

Drop us an email at team@bijoux.com and we will update your order as soon as we can.

how do i track my order?

At any time, you can view your order status on your My Account page. This page will be updated as soon as possible, at two different stages: first, when your credit card is charged and again when your product is shipped.

can i use multiple promo codes at checkout?

We only accept one promo code at a time. We are sure that there will be other opportunities to use your promo code in the future.

the pieces real?","tab_content":"

100%! All our pieces are made of 14-karat gold and never plated. For our flagship collection we use gray diamonds, black diamonds, and opals. If you care for them as we recommend, you will enjoy them forever.<\/p>","_id":"78a1973"},{"tab_title":"Where and how are they made?","tab_content":"

All of our pieces are handmade by artisan goldsmiths in the Philippines. Coming very soon, we will take you into our studios so you can take a peek at the painstaking process involved in making LIMNIA pieces.<\/p>","_id":"3c69571"},{"tab_title":"Where are the matereals from?","tab_content":"

We purchase our gold from the Philippines, and, our stones and diamonds from Bangkok and India. While we can certify that our stones are conflict-free and ethically sourced, we are currently tracking the source of our gold.<\/p>","_id":"a2275c8"},{"tab_title":"How is bijoux different?","tab_content":"

Our collection of modular fine jewelry essentials are designed to be creatively customized to keep up with your bold, dynamic life. Our pieces are made of high quality gold and stones, so you can wear them now while you build a jewelry wardrobe you will love forever.<\/p>","_id":"61627ee"},{"tab_title":"Is there a way I can touch the products?","tab_content":"

Our collection of modular fine jewelry essentials are designed to be creatively customized to keep up with your bold, dynamic life. Our pieces are made of high quality gold and stones, so you can wear them now while you build a jewelry wardrobe you will love forever.<\/p>","_id":"030a9ef"},{"tab_title":"Can I bring my old jewelry pieces to you for re-design?","tab_content":"

We love collaborating on new designs especially when it involves a piece you love so much. Due to the size of our operation, we are unable to do any custom work right now. But if it means so much to you, shoot us an email at team@limnia.com and we will see what we can do.<\/p>","_id":"ca68c3f"}],"selected_icon":{"value":"fas If you live in any of the 50 states and Puerto Rico, LIMNIA will deliver to you. Our pieces might take longer to get to you if you live in Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico, but they will get there.<\/p>","_id":"78a1973"},{"tab_title":"I live in Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico \u2013 when will I receive my order?","tab_content":"

Shipping to these states will take a bit longer. Expect about 12-16 days from the time of your order.<\/p>","_id":"3c69571"},{"tab_title":"What are my shipping options?","tab_content":"

1) Ground: (5-8 days): Always free.


2) Expedited (2-3 days and available to the 48 contiguous states): $25


3) Overnight (1-2 days and available to the 48 contiguous states): $35<\/p>","_id":"a2275c8"},{"tab_title":"When will Bijoux ship my order?","tab_content":"

As soon as we receive your order, we will process it for shipment. All orders placed after 12 pm PT are processed the following day. Our UPS or Fedex courier will then pick it up from us and be on his way to bring the pieces to you. You will receive an email with tracking number as soon as it\u2019s on its way.<\/p>","_id":"61627ee"},{"tab_title":"I can't track my order!","tab_content":"

Don't worry! Sometimes, it takes a couple of days to update your shipment status. Email us at team@limnia.com and we will let you know where your package is.<\/p>","_id":"030a9ef"},{"tab_title":"I accidentally put in the wrong address for my order.","tab_content":"

Hate when that happens. But no worries! We will correct it for you if your purchase hasn\u2019t shipped yet. I return my jewelry?","tab_content":"

Sorry it didn\u2019t work out. You can return your unused pieces within 14 days of receiving them. Just send us an email at team@bijoux.com.<\/p>

To be eligible for a return, please ensure that the jewelry is in its original packaging and in perfect condition, that you have the proof of purchase and that you've obtained the shipping label from us. We reserve the right to refuse returns that do not meet the criteria.<\/p>

We will refund you in full back to your original form of payment. However, please note that we will not refund any shipping charges you paid.<\/p>

If you have any other questions about returning your pieces or have any second thoughts, email us at team@bijoux.com.<\/p>","_id":"a2275c8"},{"tab_title":"When will i get my monay back for my return?","tab_content":"

Refunds will take anywhere between 5-10 business days to appear back on your statement.<\/p>","_id":"61627ee"},{"tab_title":"Help! I got the wrong product.","tab_content":"

Oh no, we are so sorry about that. We will make it right for you. Please email us at: team@bijoux.com.<\/p>","_id":"030a9ef"},{"tab_title":"where should i drop off my return?","tab_content":"

You can drop it off at any USPS collection box, USPS post office or any FedEx store.<\/p>","_id":"ca68c3f"}],"selected_icon":{"value":"fas We accept Visa, MasterCard, and American Express credit cards.<\/p>","_id":"61627ee"},{"tab_title":"when will my credit card be charged?","tab_content":"

Your credit card will be charged as soon as your order is accepted and processed.<\/p>","_id":"030a9ef"},{"tab_title":"what can i do if my payment is declined?","tab_content":"

Not to worry, it happens to the best of us. Check the following:

Check that your card is not expired.
Double check the accuracy of your credit card\u2019s billing details; such as the billing address and the security code (i.e. what you\u2019ve entered into the checkout details).
Call your credit card issuer \u2013 they might\u2019ve have stopped this payment from going through.<\/p>","_id":"ca68c3f"}],"selected_icon":{"value":"fas New

We are constantly working on creation of new collections, capsules and collaborations with well-know brands

Our team is my second family. Each of #bijouxgirls shares my vision of the world, of beauty, taste and sincerely carries the philosophy of our brand. Our morning begins with hugs and warm conversations and our evening often turns into loud parties with dances until dawn. Shop Now

Explore our
gift Ideas

All collection [elementor-template id="7342"][elementor-template id="7348"][elementor-template id="7355"] Previous Next

Our team has confidence and faith in the future of the brand

Bijoux Jewelry was founded in Ukraine in March 2016. For the last three years brand has released 19 collections of jewelry. In 2017 the first showroom was opened in Kyiv, and in 2019 we finally moved to a new big space. Bijoux Fine Jewelry team got the Best Start-Up Award from the Elle Style Awards in 2017, and in 2018 brand was nominated as the Best Accessories Brand at the Best Fashion Awards. e e expolore collections

Precious metals

14k Solid Gold

Solid gold is a precious metal that will not oxidize or discolor since it is the least reactive metal.

Sterling silver

We plate our silver jewelry in rhodium, which gives it extra shine and durability.

Gold Vermeil

For a piece to be considered gold vermeil, the gold must be a minimum of 10k and 1.5 microns. We use 18k gold layered on sterling silver.

Behind the fine

When it comes to our manufacturing, we vet and partner with top jewelers who commit to exceptional craftsmanship, ethical practices and the finest materials.

fair pricing

High
Quality

We work with expert jewelers who use high quality and enduring materials. From precious metals, set with genuine gemstones and ethically sourced diamonds. shop collection

item.title: End of Year Reflections
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
The journey to creative inspiration can be an infinitely fulfilling one. When we are in alignment and our creativity is flowing, it seems as if all the world is opening up to us and revealing its beauty. When creative blockages emerge, however—due to stress, self-doubt or simply becoming stagnant in our own routines—inspiration can seem increasingly elusive. This month, we’re diving deep into the creative journey and sharing our steps to reawaken inspiration—just in time to greet spring, the season of renewal!

Below, the Satya Jewelry team shares some of their favorite moments and lessons of the past year—and the hope and positivity that 2020 holds for each of them.

Front matter, or preliminaries, is the first section of a book, and is usually the smallest section in terms of the number of pages. Each page is counted, but no folio or page number is expressed, or printed, on either display pages or blank pages. Book design is the art of incorporating the content, style, format, design, and sequence of the various components of a book into a coherent whole. In the words of Jan Tschichold, “methods and rules upon which it is impossible to improve, have been developed over centuries. To produce perfect books, these rules have to be brought back to life and applied.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k2JKO5Pgjwg&t=1sMy last trip was June 2019. I would usually just go with cousins or alone with my brother, but this time it was my brother and I, and our parents. Returning to Singapore, one of the more resolutely fascinating cities I have ever been to. Our host, Lee on the photo will be our companion during all our trip.

Moving into a new year is always excited and a perfect opportunity to reflect on the year we are leaving behind and the new year we are being. For me, 2019 was a year of great change. Breaking down old and rebuilding new. This is sometimes very hard but I believe it has set the tone for the year ahead.

Satya Tweet
As this decade comes to a close, I can say this year has had its ups and downs but I am grateful to end the year in good health. I’ve always been a huge fan of fashion and design so I was most excited to learn that a collection I helped design for a friend had been picked up by a major retailer. Starting a new job 2 weeks after I moved into a new place was challenging but everyone was so supportive and helpful that it made the transition a lot easier. I am excited to see what 2020 brings!

Recent Posts

Starting at Satya Jewelry just 6 months ago, I can say that I feel like I found my happy place. Being surrounded by friendly, kind, smart and genuine people is a blessing and I couldn’t ask for a better team. Front matter, or preliminaries, is the first section of a book, and is usually the smallest section in terms of the number of pages. Each page is counted, but no folio or page number is expressed, or printed, on either display pages or blank pages.

Book design is the art of incorporating the content, style, format, design, and sequence of the various components of a book into a coherent whole.

Want to join us? Make a list using these 4 simple steps:

As we enter 2020, I couldn’t have asked for a better year to close out the decade. Both personally and professionally, this year has been full of great challenges and rewards. I was so excited to have completed my first ever Marathon in early November and followed that with my all-time favorite collaboration launch: The Yoga Girl Collection.

Both of these projects took a lot of hard work and dedication but wouldn’t have been possible without the support, collaboration, and teamwork from all of the amazing people around me. While we cherish the magic of the season and look forward to a clean slate in the new year, we also like to steal a few precious moments to quietly reflect on the year we’re leaving behind:

What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

I am excited to begin a new year free of so much that has been weighing me down. I feel excited about all the possibilities embarking on a new decade.While we cherish the magic of the season and look forward to a clean slate in the new year, we also like to steal a few precious moments to quietly reflect on the year we’re leaving behind: What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

I am excited to begin a new year free of so much that has been weighing me down. I feel excited about all the possibilities embarking on a new decade.While we cherish the magic of the season and look forward to a clean slate in the new year, we also like to steal a few precious moments to quietly reflect on the year we’re leaving behind: What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

Gift cards
Downloadable software products
Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

Book with obvious signs of use
CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at hello@bijoux.com for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: The Creative Journey: 5 Steps to Reawaken Inspiration
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded:
The journey to creative inspiration can be an infinitely fulfilling one. When we are in alignment and our creativity is flowing, it seems as if all the world is opening up to us and revealing its beauty. When creative blockages emerge, however—due to stress, self-doubt or simply becoming stagnant in our own routines—inspiration can seem increasingly elusive. This month, we’re diving deep into the creative journey and sharing our steps to reawaken inspiration—just in time to greet spring, the season of renewal!

Below, the Satya Jewelry team shares some of their favorite moments and lessons of the past year—and the hope and positivity that 2020 holds for each of them.

Front matter, or preliminaries, is the first section of a book, and is usually the smallest section in terms of the number of pages. Each page is counted, but no folio or page number is expressed, or printed, on either display pages or blank pages. Book design is the art of incorporating the content, style, format, design, and sequence of the various components of a book into a coherent whole. In the words of Jan Tschichold, “methods and rules upon which it is impossible to improve, have been developed over centuries. To produce perfect books, these rules have to be brought back to life and applied.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k2JKO5Pgjwg&t=1sMy last trip was June 2019. I would usually just go with cousins or alone with my brother, but this time it was my brother and I, and our parents. Returning to Singapore, one of the more resolutely fascinating cities I have ever been to. Our host, Lee on the photo will be our companion during all our trip.

Moving into a new year is always excited and a perfect opportunity to reflect on the year we are leaving behind and the new year we are being. For me, 2019 was a year of great change. Breaking down old and rebuilding new. This is sometimes very hard but I believe it has set the tone for the year ahead.

Satya Tweet
As this decade comes to a close, I can say this year has had its ups and downs but I am grateful to end the year in good health. I’ve always been a huge fan of fashion and design so I was most excited to learn that a collection I helped design for a friend had been picked up by a major retailer. Starting a new job 2 weeks after I moved into a new place was challenging but everyone was so supportive and helpful that it made the transition a lot easier. I am excited to see what 2020 brings!

Recent Posts

Starting at Satya Jewelry just 6 months ago, I can say that I feel like I found my happy place. Being surrounded by friendly, kind, smart and genuine people is a blessing and I couldn’t ask for a better team. Front matter, or preliminaries, is the first section of a book, and is usually the smallest section in terms of the number of pages. Each page is counted, but no folio or page number is expressed, or printed, on either display pages or blank pages.

Book design is the art of incorporating the content, style, format, design, and sequence of the various components of a book into a coherent whole.

Want to join us? Make a list using these 4 simple steps:

As we enter 2020, I couldn’t have asked for a better year to close out the decade. Both personally and professionally, this year has been full of great challenges and rewards. I was so excited to have completed my first ever Marathon in early November and followed that with my all-time favorite collaboration launch: The Yoga Girl Collection.

Both of these projects took a lot of hard work and dedication but wouldn’t have been possible without the support, collaboration, and teamwork from all of the amazing people around me. While we cherish the magic of the season and look forward to a clean slate in the new year, we also like to steal a few precious moments to quietly reflect on the year we’re leaving behind:

What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

I am excited to begin a new year free of so much that has been weighing me down. I feel excited about all the possibilities embarking on a new decade.While we cherish the magic of the season and look forward to a clean slate in the new year, we also like to steal a few precious moments to quietly reflect on the year we’re leaving behind: What we’ve loved, learned, the challenges we’ve overcome and what we’ve accomplished in 2019.

item.title: Bliss Golden Ring
item.dc:creator: vamtam
item.content:encoded: Yellow Gold (20 kt) Alpa System Width: 1.2 cm
item.excerpt:encoded: Intricately designed in 18k gold, this contemporary ring design features a flat top perfect for engraving. Crafted with a makers symbol inspired by the renowned Tiffany hollowware shop, the Tiffany 1837® Makers collection honors Tiffany's legacy of expert craftsmanship through a modern lens. This ring looks sleek whether worn alone or with other Tiffany jewelry. Product Link

Olivia Golden Bracelet designs represent individual strength and perpetual power, worn outwardly to express what lies within.
